messages.pass: Links can be distinguished from surrounding text in some way other than by color
messages.fail: Links need to be distinguished from surrounding text in some way other than by color

incomplete.bgContrast: Element's contrast ratio could not be determined. Check for a distinct hover/focus style
incomplete.bgImage: Element's contrast ratio could not be determined due to a background image
incomplete.bgGradient: Element's contrast ratio could not be determined due to a background gradient
incomplete.imgNode: Element's contrast ratio could not be determined because element contains an image node
incomplete.bgOverlap: Element's contrast ratio could not be determined because of element overlap
